sub_title: Data Scientist and Founder at Sarkhawas Technologies | Transforming Data into Value | Based in the Netherlands
summary:
I am dedicated to empowering businesses by harnessing the full potential of their data through my extensive expertise in Data Science.
 
I believe that data can solve many problems if used correctly. I do not know it all but have a learn it all attitude towards anything I indulge in.

Thank you for reading till here, below is a concise overview of my qualifications:

- Over four years of hands-on experience in both development and research.
- Proficient in a wide spectrum of data science domains, including Deep/Machine learning, transfer learning, object detection, image classification, Predictive model building, language models, LLM, and Generative AI.
- Mastery of essential programming languages and tools such as Python, SQL, Tableau, and more.
- Adept at utilizing libraries and frameworks including Python 3.x, Pandas, Keras, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn, OpenCV, pyspark, boto3, NLTK, Seaborn, Langchain, Transformers, BeautifulSoup, Matplotlib, Tableau, Anaconda, Jupyter, Pycharm, Tableau, Google Collab, Spyder, Git, Gitlab, Docker.
- Proficiency in building Streamlit applications.
- Contributions to international publications in IEEE and Inderscience journals.
- A collaborative team player, driven by a passion for learning and making meaningful contributions.
- Proven experience in developing production-level code.
- Skilled in shell scripting and well-versed in Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines.
- Familiarity with AWS cloud, including DynamoDB databases and S3 buckets.
- Extensive experience with GIT.
- Proficiency in Agile methodologies.

Thank you for taking the time to explore my profile. I look forward to connecting with like-minded professionals and exploring potential collaborations.

treasury_media.description:
- Completed a Post Graduate Diploma in Data Science from the prestigious Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (CDAC), India
- Achieved a top 1% ranking in the entrance exam, highlighting dedication and aptitude 
- Gained hands-on experience in Python, Data Analytics, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Database Management Systems - SQL, Data Visualization - Tableau, Statistics with R, Big Data Technologies (Hadoop, Hive, Spark) and more

treasury_media.title: IEEE International Conference paper published on Particle Analysis Using Improved Adaptive Level Set Method Based Image Segmentation
treasury_media.description: Particle analysis is one of the most difficult tasks in material science and technology. Detection of size and shape of particles is important for gaining information about the material as well as for better control over the quality of the product. This paper presents an improved adaptive level set segmentation technique to overcome the disadvantages of false boundary detection and sensitivity to evolution curve's initial position which is present in the traditional level set methods.

treasury_media.title: Inderscience Journal publication on Image processing techniques for material science particle analysis
treasury_media.description: Material particle analysis is one of the difficult tasks in material science engineering. This paper presents an improved adaptive level set method: modified from traditional level set method (LSM) with respect to the parameters; adaptive directional speed and stopping force based on weighted probability, which further improves the algorithm accuracy for particle image segmentation and parameters measurement.

profile_positions.description:
Elevating Possibilities with Data Science and AI Expertise

Welcome to my corner of the data universe! I'm Guzayya Sarkhawas, and I'm not just a data scientist; I'm a catalyst for transformation, an alchemist for data, and a visionary in the realm of artificial intelligence. 

Specializations: Deep Learning, Transfer Learning, Image Classification, Computer Vision, Generative AI 

In the dynamic landscape of data-driven decision-making, I wield the power of Deep Learning to turn raw data into actionable insights. When it comes to Image Classification AI, I don't just recognize patterns; I redefine them.

Innovation: Pioneering tomorrow's solutions, today

I'm not just keeping up with the latest trends; I'm setting them. With an insatiable thirst for knowledge, I'm continually exploring the bleeding edge of AI and data science, pushing the boundaries of what's possible. Innovation is not a choice; it's my DNA.

Let's Connect: https://www.linkedin.com/in/guzayya-sarkhawas/

Whether you're on a quest to leverage data science for unparalleled growth or simply looking for inspiration, I invite you to connect. Together, we can harness the power of data, shape the future with AI, and turn aspirations into achievements. Join me on this thrilling data-driven odyssey!

Reach Out: guzayya.sarkhawas@gmail.com
